OVERVIEW

The exhibition of World Manufacturing Convention 2018 & Investment and Trade Expo 2018 will be held on May 25th, 26th, 27th at the Hefei Binhu International Exhibition & Convention Center in Anhui, China.

The exhibition area is set to “3+3” mode, three comprehensive exhibitions and three project exhibitions. The comprehensive exhibitions are integrated exhibition, international smart manufacturing exhibition, and domestic smart manufacturing exhibition; Project exhibitions include Anhui Import and Export Commodity Fairs, Financial Services Exhibitions, and Anhui Human Resources Exhibition. Featuring high-end smart manufacturing, this exhibition will set up an outdoor smart car experience display area and a smart manufacturing solution docking and exchange area (experience project: intelligent warehouse logistics, intelligent workshop).

International and domestic high-end smart manufacturing products, technologies, and achievements of diverse themes are to be displayed at the same time. Experts, entrepreneurs, talents, and customers face to face with each other. Robots and reality shows compete on the same stage. The “real people and dummy” alternate to reflect innovation-driven and intelligent manufacturing leading a better life.

The exhibition is located in the main exhibition hall, namely Hall 9 and Hall 10 of Hefei Binhu International Exhibition & Convention Center in Hefei, covering an area of 43, 000 square meters. The comprehensive exhibition, domestic smart manufacturing exhibition, international smart manufacturing exhibition, and financial services exhibition will be held in the main exhibition hall, Anhui human resources exhibition in Hall 9 and Anhui Import and Export Commodity Fairs in Hall 10.

ABOUT US

Launched by the Global Alliance of SMEs (GASME), World Manufacturing Convention 2018 is co-hosted by Global Alliance of SMEs, United Nations Industrial Development Organization, Anhui Provincial Government, Chinese People’s Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries. This convention will kick off in Hefei in May 2018.
